channel.title: Running server Issue -- Please help
channel.description: I have a problem with trying to play a server. When I'm playing it, if I click twice then the client shuts down. I heard this has to deal with having windows 7 64 bit! >:(

item.title: Running server Issue -- Please help
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

It does have to do with that, You can try several solutions:

  1. find a 64 to 32 bit converter for windows
  2. see what version of java you have downloaded, try using 32 bit java.

Read full topic
